CIFX 70E-DP: Brief Description: PC Card cifX Low Profile PCI Express PROFIBUS DP Master or Slave or PROFIBUS MPI Device
Function: Communication interface with PCI Express and PROFIBUS interface
Bus Type: PCI Express, One Lane Port
Data Access: DPM or DMA (Direct Memory Access)
Isolation Voltage: 1000 V DC (tested for 1 minute)
Operating Element: Rotary switch slot number (card ID)
